articles.description: COVID-19 vaccinations in Africa tripled over the past week, though protecting even 10% of the continent by the end of September remains "a very daunting task," the Africa director of the World Health Organization said Thursday.

articles.title: Huawei Nova Y60 With Triple Rear Cameras, 5,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Huawei Nova Y60 has launched in South Africa. It comes with a triple rear camera setup and a 5,000mAh battery. It runs on Android 11 and is powered by a MediaTek Helio P35 SoC. The phone features a 6.6-inch HD display.

articles.title: Vaccines should be mandatory in South Africa: expert - BusinessTech
articles.description: WHO science council member Salim Abdool Karim says that Covid-19 vaccines should be made mandatory in South Africa, with exceptions made for those who cannot take a vaccine for medical reasons.

articles.author: Paul Ash
articles.title: 'Meteor' seen in evening sky was likely a rocket plunging back to Earth, say astronomers - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The streak of light that blazed across Southern Africa's evening sky on Tuesday was most likely a rocket re-entering Earth's atmosphere and not a meteorite, according to astronomers.

articles.title: Sizwe Dhlomo says Beyoncé should have expected backlash after Tiffany & Co. shoot wearing 'SA yellow diamond' - TimesLIVE
articles.description: "We can’t still be using terms like ‘discovery’ to refer to colonial looting in 2021. This diamond was stolen from South Africa in 1878," Simphiwe Dana added.
